defaults.golden_rule: When in doubt: hydrate, rest, simplify.
defaults.hydration_note: Sip coconut water slowly. Donâ€™t rush intake.
defaults.safety_note: If symptoms escalate or feel unsafe, stop and seek medical support.

days.title: Commitment
days.daily_message: Today is not about comfort. It is about agreement. Stay calm.
days.journal_prompt: Why am I choosing this now? What am I ready to let go of?

symptom_guidance.cravings: Hydrate slowly and breathe. Cravings pass when the nervous system feels safe.
symptom_guidance.headache: Increase water intake and rest your eyes. Do not push.
